title: Is it possible to burn a CD into a DVD? - Quora

response.answer_text: Burning a CD into a DVD is desired by many people, and there is not much different between the too, accept the capacity. In addition CD mostly accepts the audio version, while the DVD audio versions are not played by many players too. Then given a task to me for burning the CD into DVD, I do require Wondershare video converter ultimate for the same. Once uploaded the CD into the software, I look forward to convert them into MP4 as the format can be easily read by the DVD. And once converted the software just take to burn the same into DVD, with no quality loss. The steps are easy as everything is readymade, you just need to press few tabs and your work is done. So, here is my answer, yes CD can be burn into DVD.
It's certainly possible, if your CD drive can handle DVDs.Worth it? Not really. Nowadays, there's not much that you can do with CDs that can't be done much more conveniently with a USB drive.
